verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: sought] [ARG1: to distance itself Monday from Rudy Giuliani 's dramatic public statements about Iran and North Korea] , [ARGM-ADV: saying that President Donald Trump 's new lawyer does not speak for the president on matters of foreign policy] .
